channel.title: Annoying problem

item.title: Annoying problem
item.dc:creator: @darklordtom darklordtom
item.description:
@darklordtom wrote:

I’ve got Testscape and I have been adding NPC’s and drops untill one day I found that some of my abbysal demons and some other npcs won’t drop items anymore can someone tell me whats wrong. Heres the code

ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomAbyssal(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); } if(NPCID2 == 360 || NPCID2 == 361 ||NPCID2 == 362 || NPCID2 == 363 || NPCID2 == 364 || NPCID2 == 365 || NPCID2 == 366) {
thats in NPCHANDLER
and in Item2

[code] }

public static int abyssal[] = {389,385,389,385,989,989,989,989,1079,1093,1073,1073,1073,1113,1113,1109,1109,1123,1123,1127,995,995,995,995,1149,1149,1163,1163,1163,1187,1201,1213,1213,1213,1213,1213,4151,4151,4151,1215,1215,1249,1303,1303,1305,1289,1333,1333,1333,1333,1359,1359,1359,1359,1359,1371,1373,1371,1371,1639,1639,1645,1643,1643,1704,1704,1712,1731,1731,1731,3140};

public static int randomAbyssal()
{
	return abyssal[(int)(Math.random()*abyssal.length)];
}	[/code]

I just need to know how to fix the abbysal demons then I can figure out the rest…
